articles.title: Kohli's selfless gesture for Bumrah involving Chepauk DJ wins hearts - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Spinners may have dominated against Australia but Jasprit Bumrah started it all off by getting India an early breakthrough.  | Cricket
articles.content: India's 2023 World Cup campaign got off to the best possible start at the MA Chidambaram Stadium. Not only did they beat Australia by six wickets, they were airtight with their bowling and fielding a… [+1893 chars]
